content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: iron_pickaxe
inventory=[{"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 60, "index": 20}, {"type": "warped_sign", "quantity": 5, "index": 24}, {"type": "dropper", "quantity": 48, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_terracotta", "quantity": 5, "index": 28}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 34}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 4, "index": 35}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 5, "index": 38}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 38, "index": 41}]
thought: To craft a iron_pickaxe, I need to craft 2 sticks. To craft a stick, I need to place 2 bamboo side by side in the crafting table. Therefore I will move the bamboo from slot 35 to slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "dark_oak_sapling", "quantity": 8, "index": 18}, {"type": "prismarine_crystals", "quantity": 60, "index": 20}, {"type": "warped_sign", "quantity": 5, "index": 24}, {"type": "dropper", "quantity": 48, "index": 25}, {"type": "iron_ingot", "quantity": 3, "index": 27}, {"type": "black_terracotta", "quantity": 5, "index": 28}, {"type": "trader_llama_spawn_egg", "quantity": 59, "index": 34}, {"type": "bamboo", "quantity": 3, "index": 35}, {"type": "tube_coral_fan", "quantity": 5, "index": 38}, {"type": "red_sand", "quantity": 38, "index": 41}]

Ok
act: move from slot 35 to slot 4 with quantity 1
